resources.string: The IV solution injection should be given slowly for 5 minutes
The patient may feel warm when the injections are given into the buttocks
You should have IM solution available with concentration AT LEAST 50% to prepare an IM solution.
If not available, 1g of 20% IV solution should be given as an injection to the patient.
Does the available IM solution have a concentration greater than or equal to 50%?
NOTE: as the available IM percent solution is less than 50%, we will proceed with 1g 20% IV solution.
WAIT FOR 15 MINUTES TO CHECK IF FITTS ARE RE-OCURRING
